patthana17.13:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana17.13:2.1_0: Abyākataṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana17.13:2.1_1: ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.13:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana17.13:3.1_1: adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
